byline.original: By DENSIE WEBB; Densie Webb, a freelance writer and editor, is a registered dietitian

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: LOSING weight would be easier, some people believe, if the dieter didn't have to think about it so much and work at it so hard. In fact, two weight-loss programs are making millions of dollars demonstrating that convenience appeals to millions of dieting Americans.
docs.snippet: LEAD: LOSING weight would be easier, some people believe, if the dieter didn't have to think about it so much and work at it so hard. In fact, two weight-loss programs are making millions of dollars demonstrating that convenience appeals to millions...

headline.main: Study Sees Multiple Benefits in Certain Fats

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Mono-unsaturated fats like olive oil may benefit the heart not only by lowering cholesterol but also by reducing blood pressure and blood sugar, a study in Italy has suggested.
docs.snippet: LEAD: Mono-unsaturated fats like olive oil may benefit the heart not only by lowering cholesterol but also by reducing blood pressure and blood sugar, a study in Italy has suggested.
